design_philosophy.core_concept: A virtual black card experience for crafters. Dark, moody, but warm with burgundy and gold. Not corporate, but exclusive boutique.
design_philosophy.emotional_goal: Unlocking Treasure. Every punch feels like earning a gold coin.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Jewel & Luxury Archetype. Deep velvet backgrounds, metallic gold accents, and red rose motifs.

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Playfair Display' for all main titles (h1, h2). Weight: 600 or 700. Tracking: tight.
usage_rules.accents: Use 'Great Vibes' for 'Thank You', 'Welcome', 'Rewards' labels, and tier names (e.g., 'Gold Tier'). Size: 2x normal text.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter' for all functional text, inputs, and data. Keep it crisp and legible.
usage_rules.admin_panel: Strictly 'Inter' for the admin dashboard for maximum readability.

primary.description: Deep Burgundy/Red. Used for primary buttons (Sign Up, Redeem).

secondary.description: Metallic Gold. Used for progress bars, active icons, and 'Punch' stamps.

background.description: Deepest Black. Avoid pure #000000; use #0A0A0A for richness.

text.description: Cream/Beige (#F5F5DC) for text instead of white for a softer, vintage feel.

buttons.primary: bg-[#8B0000] hover:bg-[#A52A2A] text-white font-playfair tracking-wide rounded-sm shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(139,0,0,0.4)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black font-playfair rounded-sm

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-lg shadow-xl

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 text-[#F5F5DC] placeholder:text-white/20 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-[#D4AF37] rounded-md h-12

mobile.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-[#0A0A0A] overflow-x-hidden relative shadow-2xl

desktop_admin.sidebar: col-span-3 h-screen sticky top-0 bg-[#121212] border-r border-white/5

special_effects.gold_shimmer: animate-shimmer bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-white/20 to-transparent bg-[length:200%_100%]
special_effects.stamp_animation: animate-stamp scale-0 opacity-0 transition-all duration-300 ease-out
special_effects.confetti: Use canvas-confetti with colors ['#D4AF37', '#8B0000', '#FFFFFF'] for tier unlock.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'blue' links. Use Gold (#D4AF37) for links.
Ensure contrast ratios are met. The Cream text on Black bg is good, but watch out for Dark Red backgrounds.
Use 'sonner' for toasts. Style them with black background and gold border.
Admin panel must have a PIN pad component, not just a text input.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react' for icons. 2. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the background gradient. 3. Use the 'PunchCard' component as the hero of the Customer Dashboard. 4. Implementing the 'Stamp' effect is critical for user delight.
